message.value: To configure a Switch configuration
To create a new switch configuration

The switch configuration %s already exists

Cannot rename switch configuration %s, the name is missing
Cannot rename switch configuration %s as %s, this configuration already exists
The switch configuration %s has been renamed as %s

The switch configuration %s has been saved

Characteristics of the current switch configuration :%n%s

The configuration %s has been loaded

Players respawn in spectator mode from the beginning of the game
Players respawn in spectator mode after %s of play
Pvp enabled
No more resurrection

The number of switchable player must be equal or superior at one
The number of switchable player has been defined to %s
The number of switchable player hasn't been defined
The number of switchable player must be an integer

Switch after border moves has been defined to %s
Switch after border cannot be defined, value is missing
true/false

One player switch has been defined to %s

true/false

hh:mm:ss
